snippet.title: Star Trucker Reveal Trailer - Future Games Show Summer Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

A world premiere announcement trailer for Star Trucker pulled in for a rest stop at the Future Games Show Summer Showcase. This intergalactic big rig simulator blends RPG elements with the tranquil bliss of the truck sim genre… in space. Star Trucker is coming to PC in 2024.

#FutureGamesShow #FGS
